name: MCJOnline
tag_list: website-worth, seo, webmaster, website-statistics, seo-tool, diy-seo, seo-software
overview:
MCJOnline is an automated website analysis and valuation tool to help Internet marketers and website owners analyze and improve their website for better user experience and search engine ranking.

MCJOnline gathers data all over the web about any website, analyzes it and provides detailed report to understand where this website stands and what you should do in order to get the most out of it. Report includes SEO, Social Media, Usability, Hosting and Technical aspects of the code and web service.

Service is free to use and allows unlimited requests. Advanced features such as keyword tracking and historic data are coming soon and will be available as monthly subscription or by number of requests depending on your choice.

Service was launched in October 2012 and developers are already working on its second major release, which is scheduled for mid-2013.
